cast.overview: The story of Gary Valentine and Alana Kane growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.
cast.title: Licorice Pizza

cast.overview: After Santa Claus (codename: Red One) is kidnapped, the North Pole's Head of Security must team up with the world's most infamous tracker in a globe-trotting, action-packed mission to save Christmas.
cast.title: Red One

details.biography:
Mary Elizabeth Ellis (born May 11, 1979 in Laurel, Mississippi, height 5' 4" (1,63 m)) is an American actress and writer best known for her recurring role as "The Waitress" on the FX comedy series It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia. She also starred in the NBC sitcom Perfect Couples.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Mary Elizabeth Ellis, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Mary Elizabeth Ellis
